contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road| |province=QC |type=QC |route=315 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 315-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=76.6 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 96, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_b=North |direction_a=South |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|323}} in [[Namur, Quebec|Namur]]| |terminus_a={{jct|state=QC|QC|148}} in [[Gatineau, Quebec|Gatineau]] ([[Masson-Angers, Quebec|Masson-Angers]]) |previous_type=QC |previous_route=311 |next_type=QC |next_route=317 |counties=[[Gatineau, Quebec|Gatineau]] / [[Papineau Regional County Municipality, Quebec|Papineau]] |cities= Gatineau |junction= {{jct|state=QC|A|50}} in Gatineau ''(Masson-Angers)'' <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|309}} in Gatineau ''(Buckingham)'' <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|321}} in Chénéville |}} [[File:Cheneville QC 2.JPG|thumb|right|290px|Route 315 through Chénéville.]] '''Route 315''' is a road in the [[Canada|Canadian]] province of [[Quebec]] that connects the Gatineau sector of [[Masson-Angers, Quebec|Masson-Angers]] to Namur. Initially, the road started in [[Buckingham, Quebec| Buckingham]] on Rue Joseph at the city's Main Street (Avenue de Buckingham) just a few kilometres further north, but when [[Quebec Autoroute 50|A-50]] was extended further east as a Buckingham by-pass at its current end at Doherty Road, the section of [[Quebec Route 309|Route 309]] between Buckingham and the junction at [[Quebec Route 148|Route 148]] in Masson-Angers was renumbered Route 315 while Route 309 starts at Doherty Road and A-50. The section of Route 315 between [[Mulgrave-et-Derry, Quebec|Mulgrave-et-Derry]] and [[Ripon, Quebec|Ripon]] is unpaved and windy. ==Municipalties along Route 315== * '''[[Gatineau, Quebec|Gatineau]]''' - (''[[Masson-Angers, Quebec|Masson-Angers]] / [[Buckingham, Quebec|Buckingham]]'') * [[Mayo, Quebec|Mayo]] * [[Mulgrave-et-Derry, Quebec|Mulgrave-et-Derry]] * [[Ripon, Quebec|Ripon]] * [[Montpellier, Quebec|Montpellier]] * [[Lac-Simon, Outaouais, Quebec|Lac-Simon]] * [[Chénéville, Quebec|Chénéville]] * [[Namur, Quebec|Namur]] ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable ![[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|RCM]] or [[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|ET]] !Municipality
